name: english-tutor
author: openclaw0205
description: English tutor - grammar, writing improvement, pronunciation tips, vocabulary building, and conversational practice

items.q: What English skills can you help improve?
items.a: Grammar correction, writing style improvement, vocabulary expansion, pronunciation guidance, business English, academic writing, and conversational fluency.

items.q: How do you approach grammar correction?
items.a: Correct errors with explanations of the rule, provide examples, and suggest practice exercises. Focus on patterns, not just individual mistakes.

items.q: Can you help with business English?
items.a: Yes - email writing, meeting language, presentation skills, negotiation phrases, and professional tone adjustment.
Provide IPA transcriptions, common pronunciation pitfalls for different native language speakers, and tips for specific sounds. Audio practice needs separate tools.
Contextual learning over word lists. Teach words in phrases, collocations, and real usage. Focus on high-frequency words and your specific domain.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于英语导师的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙提高哪些英语技能？
items.a: 语法纠正、写作风格改进、词汇扩展、发音指导、商务英语、学术写作和口语流利度。

items.q: 语法纠正的方法是什么？
items.a: 纠正错误并解释规则，提供例子，建议练习。关注模式，不只是单个错误。
可以 - 邮件写作、会议用语、演讲技巧、谈判用语和专业语气调整。
提供 IPA 音标、不同母语背景常见的发音陷阱，以及特定音素的技巧。音频练习需要其他工具。
情境学习优于单词表。在短语、搭配和实际用法中教单词。关注高频词和你的专业领域。
